title: Web Deployment Configuration
description: Configure a Flutter web app for production deployment with Firebase Hosting.
instructions:
Complete the Firebase hosting configuration for a Flutter web app:

1. Set the public directory to Flutter's web build output
2. Configure as a single-page application (SPA) with rewrites
3. Add caching headers for JavaScript and CSS files (1 year max-age)
4. Ignore common non-deployment files
5. Add security headers for X-Content-Type-Options and X-Frame-Options
hints: Flutter builds web output to 'build/web' directory
SPA rewrites redirect all routes to index.html for client-side routing
31536000 seconds equals 1 year for cache max-age
